Title: Asteroids
Help:
Press W to advance.

Press A and D to rotate.

Press spacebar to shoot and E to change weapons.

 Press Q to explode all the bombs 

 Press escape to pause.

Each 1.000 points you earn a life.

Avoid asteroids at all cost!
